name: BOX FIGHT
description:
Controls-

Esc to exit full screen

WASD

Mouse Pointer to Aim

Space to Dash

Left Click To Shoot

R to Reload

Right Arrow To Increase Volume

Win by getting 100 points!!

Lose by getting killed 3 times!!

Pick Between the four classes including marksman, assassin, tank, and mage!!!

Creators- David Albay, Paul Omamos

SFX- sfxr.me and mixkit.co

Music- Melodyloops.com

Bugs- Sometimes the bullets only go upwards

Reminder-

Long presses don't work on any weapons except for flamethrowers

There is no auto reload

Sadly this is not available for any other operating systems other than windows this will be fixed soon
